evs.name: Certificate of wedding ceremony from the Church or City Hall
evs.description: Certificate of Church or City Hall.

evs.name: Identity Card or a photocopy of it for both members
evs.description: Identity Card or a photocopy of it for both members

evs.name: Sworn statement under Law 1599/86 regarding the exact address of residence
evs.description: Sworn statement under Law 1599/86 regarding the exact address of residence. The above Law should also declare the non-receipt of the Movement Card from another Prefecture or KEP.

evs.name: 2 Recent Photographs
evs.description: For the issuance of a new card, two recent photographs are required, one of which is affixed to the Cerificat, and the other is attached to the application of the beneficiary.
